tool_description: Generate images(base64) from echart or chartjs simple and fast.
name: chart2image
title: chart2image

api_list.name: Chartjs
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chart2image.p.rapidapi.com/chart"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chart2image.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
